question: Who are the key data scientists in companies that have closed major deals with analytics vendors in the last 12 months?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have closed major deals with analytics vendors in the last 12 months. [CompanyDealMaster]
List the analytics vendors involved in these deals. [CompanyVendorProductDetail]
Identify key data scientists working at the companies that closed these deals. [PersonaUser]
Match the data scientists to their respective companies that have made the deals. [PersonaUser, CompanyDealMaster]
